# Copilot Instructions for Harsha-Vardhan-Katuri Profile Repository

## Repository Overview
This is a personal GitHub profile repository showcasing portfolio, skills, and achievements. No executable code; primarily markdown-based documentation.

## Key Patterns & Conventions

### README Structure
- Use centered headings with `<h1 align="center">` for main title
- Include typing animation SVG after title
- Add status badges (visitor counter, open to work, location) in centered div
- Structure sections: Trophies, About Me, Quote, Projects, Skills (table format), Education, Achievements, Connect, Fun Facts, Stats
- Use HTML tables for skills with inline badges
- Include GitHub activity section with comment markers
- Add fun facts with emojis
- Use centered connect badges
- Include call-to-action message and resume/portfolio links in Connect section

### Content Updates
- Add new certifications under "## üèÜ Key Achievements and Certifications" with Google Drive links
- Update "About Me" sections with current activities
- Add projects under "## üöÄ Featured Projects" linking to portfolio or repos
- Update fun facts and quotes as needed
- Maintain GitHub stats badges at bottom using github-readme-stats API

### External Integrations
- Typing Animation: `https://readme-typing-svg.herokuapp.com/?font=Fira+Code&size=22&color=0e75b6&center=true&vCenter=true&width=500&height=50&lines=Embedded+Engineer+%7C+Firmware+Engineer`
- Visitor Counter: `https://komarev.com/ghpvc/?username=Harsha-vardhan-katuri&label=Profile%20views&color=0e75b6&style=flat`
- Status Badges: Open to Work, Location using shields.io
- GitHub Profile Trophy: `https://github-profile-trophy.vercel.app/?username=Harsha-vardhan-katuri&theme=radical&no-frame=true&no-bg=false&margin-w=4`
- GitHub Activity: Use `<!--START_SECTION:activity-->` and `<!--END_SECTION:activity-->` for automatic updates
- GitHub Stats: `https://github-readme-stats.vercel.app/api?username=Harsha-vardhan-katuri&theme=midnight-purple&hide_border=false&include_all_commits=false&count_private=false`
- Top Languages: `https://github-readme-stats.vercel.app/api/top-langs/?username=Harsha-vardhan-katuri&theme=midnight-purple&hide_border=false&include_all_commits=false&count_private=false&layout=compact`

### Workflow
- No build/test commands needed
- Direct markdown editing for updates
- Commit changes to update profile display
- Activity section updates automatically via GitHub Actions if configured

## AI Agent Guidelines
- When adding new tools/languages: Add to skills table with appropriate badges from [devicons](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/devicons/devicon/master/icons/)
- For new achievements: Use consistent bullet points with links to certificates
- Preserve existing theme (midnight-purple) for stats badges
- Update contact information in both text and badge formats
- Structure About Me with subheadings for clarity
- Add education details with institution and relevant coursework
- Keep fun facts engaging and professional
